replies.replyComment: @Dayan Hamine pawul palane hodai yako samanalayo ekathu wela rata kanavata wada. Den paksha pata amataka karala ekathu weyau me rata goda daganna. Dan API okkogema janapathi e manussaya. Kawuru Mona kiwath. E manussaya palanaya subawadi margekata aragena yanna utsaha karai. Ekata pluwan shakthiya dipalla. Eccharai wenna one.

SIRASA hodai. Un hemadama puka dunne mokatada unp anduwak Genna. Ranil oyataram rata kana taramata haiya Aran Wada kale SIRASA wage awajathaka channel hinda. Eken Ratata Una agathiya thopita terenne ne eka ganan ganneth ne ubala. Dan ewa wadak ne. Aluth Janadipathi thumata Dan me rata subawadi margekata aragena yanna Ida dipalla. Ekata ashirwada karapalla. Me ape rata. API okkoma jiwath wena rata. Me anduwata kelawenakan balan innathiwa ekata akathuwei rata goda daganna. Sakkili adahas nathiwa
@Parakum ubata  17 mn meh comment ekata dennam reply ekak
awarata payana hirge mafia vilapaya passen passata  pallam behela yanawaa.
Ambooo menna hiru tv eke horun tika awith
